arts.ttl: We can’t control it – McKenna calm about escape bid despite overdue Ipswich win
arts.sum: Goals from Nathan Broadhead and top-scorer Liam Delap did the damage at Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: McKenna 'really proud' after Ipswich beat Bournemouth
arts.sum: Ipswich manager Kieran McKenna is "really proud" of his side after a 2-1 Premier League win over Bournemouth at the Vitality Stadium.

arts.ttl: Nathan Broadhead on target as Ipswich beat Bournemouth for survival lifeline
arts.sum: The Cherries did get a goal back 23 minutes from time.

arts.ttl: ‘Revolution and rejuvenation’ – Manager may be done with Bournemouth player, exit seems likely
arts.sum: Bournemouth loanee Philip Billing isn’t earning too many fans in his loan spell at Napoli. He failed to impress against AC Milan at the weekend, giving away a penalty. While that spot-kick wasn’t converted by Santiago Gimenez, the Italian press didn’t spare the Dane and his showing. arts.ttl: No Kluivert for Bournemouth vs Ipswich LIVE!
arts.sum: Two draws and eight defeats into the year, they are now 12 points adrift as they visit Bournemouth tonight in their game in hand. If Ipswich want to have any hope in this survival fight, they need to start winning football matches now.

arts.ttl: Chelsea and Liverpool are 'battling it out to sign £50m-rated Bournemouth star' - but 'face fierce competition from Spanish giants Real Madrid'
arts.sum: Chelsea and Liverpool are both in the running to sign a Bournemouth star who has caught attention with his impressive performances for Andoni Iraola's side throughout the current campaign.

arts.ttl: Dean Huijsen transfer latest as Liverpool and Chelsea learn Bournemouth star's release clause
arts.sum: Dean Huijsen is set to be one of the most sought after players of the summer transfer window and Chelsea and Liverpool are understood to be plotting a move for the Spain international, who has a £50m release clause in his contract with Bournemouth

arts.ttl: How is former Plymouth Argyle star Panutche Camara faring now after Ipswich Town, Charlton Athletic injury hell?

arts.ttl: Chelsea and Liverpool eye Dean Huijsen as Bournemouth brace for bids
arts.sum: Real Madrid are also monitoring the centre-half, one of a number of Bournemouth players expected to command interest

arts.ttl: Man United transfer news: Red Devils 'have major advantage' in fierce battle for in-demand Liam Delap
arts.sum: Manchester United reportedly hold further internal discussions over a summer move for Ipswich Town centre-forward Liam Delap.
